creditline: Gift of Richard and Roberta Simmons
description: a. trousers-white ground with black ikat stripes and discontinuous supplementary weft patterning in red, pink, green, purple, and orange; 40 1/4 X 25 1/4 inches at waist; b. sash-red ground with ikat and royal blue stripes; 79 X 8 5/8 inches. Surface ornamentation (Dyed)
medium: Cotton; four selvedge, warp faced, plain weave ikat (jaspe)
title: Man's sash (banda) and trousers
